headline: S&P Global Announces Additional Leadership Appointments in Mobility Division
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today announced the appointments of key roles on the S&P Global Mobility ("Mobility") executive leadership team as the business continues working towards its planned separation from S&P Global into a standalone public company. The appointments are as follows:
